entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters in the story. He is trying to remember something.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another main character in the story. Harry notices her comprehension through her widened eyes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a third main character in the story. He is looking astonished at Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: marvolo gaunt
entities.description: Marvolo Gaunt is an old man who lived in the past. Harry mentions that he was ignorant and cared only about his ancestry.

relationships.description: Harry notices Hermione's comprehension through her widened eyes.
Harry is talking to Ron and Hermione about the sign of the Hallows.
